execution_plan.description: Get IDs of all customers whose gender denotes female (case-insensitive match for common values).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE LOWER(gender_code) IN ('female','f');

execution_plan.description: Get order IDs for orders placed by the customers found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM Orders WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);

execution_plan.description: Get product IDs from order items for the orders found in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_item_id, order_id, product_id FROM Order_Items WHERE order_id IN ($step2.order_id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve distinct product name, price and description for products that appear in the order items found in step 3.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step3.product_id);
